welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Newburyport, where the charm of a historic seaside town meets modern amenities. Known for its picturesque harbor, quaint shops, and delicious seafood, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers, including dining options, rental car services, and a gift shop.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'MHT Airport WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.
